snippet.title: Attrition - Official Trailer (Short Version)
snippet.description:
Where strategy and tactics are put to the test.

Attrition is a 2D turn-based strategy game where your army's movement range is randomly set at the start of each turn. With emphasis on unit movement and positioning to secure an advantage over your opponent, only the best commanders will survive the trials and tribulations of attrition warfare.

Available now on: https://lmg3864.itch.io/attrition

Want to try Attrition for free? Download the free demo in the same link.

Follow the game on twitter: @GameAttrition
